trans-unit.source: Built-In Desired State Configuration Resources for Linux
Resources are building blocks that you can use to write a PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) script.
trans-unit.target: Les ressources sont des blocs de construction que vous pouvez utiliser pour écrire un script DSC PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: DSC for Linux comes with a set of built-in functionality for configuring resources such as files and folders, packages, environment variables, and services and processes.
trans-unit.target: DSC pour Linux est fourni avec un ensemble de fonctionnalités intégrées pour la configuration des ressources, telles que des fichiers et des dossiers, des packages, des variables d’environnement, des services et des processus.

trans-unit.source: The following table provides a list of these resources and links to topics that describe them in detail.
trans-unit.target: Le tableau suivant fournit la liste de ces ressources, ainsi que des liens vers les rubriques qui expliquent ces ressources en détail.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxArchiveResource.md)">nxArchive Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Provides a mechanism to unpack archive (.tar, .zip) files at a specific path.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxArchiveResource.md)">Ressource nxArchive</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> : fournit un mécanisme permettant de décompresser les fichiers d’archive (.tar, .zip) à un emplacement spécifique.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxEnvironmentResource.md)">nxEnvironment Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages environment variables on target nodes.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxEnvironmentResource.md)">Ressource nxEnvironment</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> : gère les variables d’environnement des nœuds cibles.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxFileResource.md)">nxFile Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages Linux files and directories.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxFileResource.md)">Ressource nxFile</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> : gère les fichiers et les répertoires Linux.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxFileLineResource.md)">nxFileLine Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages individual lines in a Linux file.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxFileLineResource.md)">Ressource nxFileLine</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> : gère les lignes individuelles d’un fichier Linux.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxGroupResource.md)">nxGroup Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages local Linux groups.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxGroupResource.md)">Ressource nxGroup</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> : gère les groupes Linux locaux.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxPackageResource.md)">nxPackage Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages packages on Linux nodes.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxPackageResource.md)">Ressource nxPackage</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> : gère les packages des nœuds Linux.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxScriptResource.md)">nxScript Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Runs scripts on target nodes.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxScriptResource.md)">Ressources nxScript</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> : exécute des scripts sur les nœuds cibles.
<ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxServiceResource.md)">Ressource nxService</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> : gère les services (démons) Linux.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxSshAuthorizedKeysResource.md)">nxSshAuthorizedKeys Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages public ssh keys for a Linux user.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxSshAuthorizedKeysResource.md)">Ressource nxSshAuthorizedKeys</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> : gère des clés ssh publiques pour un utilisateur Linux.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxUserResource.md)">nxUser Resource</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">--Manages local Linux users.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](lnxUserResource.md)">Ressource nxUser</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> : gère les utilisateurs Linux locaux.
